mapper.insert: insert into u_user_report (id, u_id, account, report_name, content, status, result, dynamic_id, create_time, modify_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{result,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{dynamicId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select * from ( select '11' as dynamic_id,b.content,'11'as status,b.modify_time, '0000-00-00 00:00:00' as create_time from p_base_config b where b.key='system.info' union select r.dynamic_id,r.content,r.status,r.modify_time,r.create_time from u_user_report r where r.result = 1 and r.u_id = #{uId} ) t order by t.modify_time desc
